name: typescript-module-template
description: A small test library written in typescript.

scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test-build: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.publish: npm run test-build && npm version && npm pack && npm publish
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm run test
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp

author: LersCode
